DOC.brief_summary: Urinary intestinal fatty acid bind protein ( i-FABP ) , marker intestinal mucosal cell damage , recently propose clinically useful measure early detection necrotizing enterocolitis ( NEC ) . However , data urinary i-FABP meconium obstruction prematurity ( MOP ) . This study aim evaluate urinary i-FABP MOP patient marker early detection .
DOC.brief_title: Intestinal Fatty Acid Binding Protein Very Low Birth Weight Infants With Meconium Obstruction
DOC.criteria: preterm infant weigh < 1,250g major congenital anomaly perinatal asphyxia ( cord pH < 7.0 )
